events.comment: Whoever is merging please delete this and use the one in mainmanu!!!!

variable.comment: 1 while aiming the pig, 0 while flying
variable.name: bak_IsAiming

variable.comment: 0 = not moving, 1 = move down, 2 = move up
variable.name: bak_blockDown

variable.comment: 0 = not moving, 1 = move front, 2 = move back
variable.name: bak_blockForward

variable.comment: 0 = not moving, 1 = move down, 2 = move up
variable.name: bak_moveDown

variable.comment: timer for vanishing the shooting ball
variable.name: bak_timer0

events.comment: On startup we need to increase the quality of the physics processing from 8 & 3 iterations to 12 & 8, otherwise sometimes the towers fall down by themselves. This can make the game run slower, but is necessary for it to be stable.
While aiming, set the pig by the catapult block.

sub-events.comment: While touching in the aiming stage, position and angle the pig to show the aim.
When releasing in the aiming stage, set IsAiming to 0 (so the pig is no longer positioned according to aim) then apply an impulse proportional to the aim.

events.comment: Move the blocker Up and down

sub-events.comment: Move the blocker front and back
